text: Àti nítorí ọ̀rọ̀ wọn (yìí): “Dájúdájú àwa pa Mọsīh, ‘Īsā ọmọ Mọryam, Òjíṣẹ́ Allāhu.” Wọn kò pa á, wọn kò sì kàn án mọ́ àgbélébùú, ṣùgbọ́n A gbé àwòrán rẹ̀ wọ ẹlòmíìràn fún wọn ni. Dájúdájú àwọn t’ó yapa-ẹnu nípa rẹ̀, kúkú wà nínú iyèméjì nínú rẹ̀; kò sí ìmọ̀ kan fún wọn nípa rẹ̀ àfi títẹ̀lé èròkérò. Wọn kò pa á ní àmọ̀dájú. sūrah āli ‘Imrọ̄n; 3:7 sūrah al-’Ani‘ām; 6: 99 àti
